duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide dental hygiene services including oral prophylaxis, periodontal assessment, and fluoride treatment.
Assist in assessment and treatment planning for patient care in coordination with the dental team.
Educate patients on oral hygiene practices and preventive care strategies to maintain oral health.
Implement infection control protocols to maintain a safe and sanitary clinical environment.
Collaborate with dental assistants and other staff to ensure efficient and effective patient care.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation in compliance with established standards.
